name: Umbra: Stop the Insomnia
description: An impending loom of darkness named Umbra slowly covers the sky, bringing life to creatures called Insomnia that ravage the lands of Edis. A magical bard, Edea, is tasked by her kingdom to save the fairy society with whom they are strongly allied and stop the Insomnia from invading their homeland any further. Travel across the land, play music with your magical flute and cast elemental spells to protect the fairies!
